attributes.additional_details:
There is talk of a New World Order being forced on the world population. We no longer feel the government is on our side but follow an agenda that is not in the best interests of the people they SERVE but in the interests of the New World Order.

The Military Industrial Complex is forcing western culture and democracy on the globe as well as being used to protect corporate interests for the New World Order and protect their illegal drug smuggling.

The intelligence agencies are assinating people and involved in global corruption to further the New World Orders agenda with our taxes.

There is a paedophile elite admitted by our politicians and media who are linked to the New World Order.

Police brutality is on the rise all over the globe and are there to protect the New World Order not the people who pay their wages.

For our protection against the New World Order, corrupt government, corrupt police and corrupt intelligence agencies we want our guns back.
